titles.title: We Are Here To Praise You

properties.copyright: 1985 Thankyou Music, Administered by EMI Christian Music Publishing

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
C
We are here to praise You,
Lift our hearts and sing.
We are here to give You
The best that we can bring.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
And it is your love
Rising from our hearts,
Ev'rything within us cries,
Abba Father.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Help us now to give You
Pleasure and delight,
Hearts and minds and wills that say,
We love You Lord.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Lord we love You
Lord we love You
Lord we love You
We love You Lord
